title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama—manage models, chat, upload docs, RAG, multi-user, dark/light themes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive (RxJava) APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with syntax highlighting, chat sessions, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: load PDFs → Chroma → Ollama embeddings & chat, all local, under 100 lines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor, or explain code using Ollama models without leaving the editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat endpoints, admin widgets, and async streaming responses.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and tool-calling support; includes Blazor sample.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles for CodeLlama, Phind, WizardCoder, Zephyr, SQLCoder, ready to import.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot that ingests URLs/PDFs, embeds with Ollama, and answers with citations.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models via threads and emoji reactions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, or generate text using any Ollama model locally.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for production pipelines.
